news_header: Several companies are set to report earnings on January 29, 2025, with expected increases in earnings per share compared to the previous year.
news_text: On January 29, 2025, multiple companies will report their earnings. ASML expects $7.18 EPS (28.21% increase), T-Mobile $2.17 EPS (29.94% increase), Danaher $2.17 EPS (3.83% increase), ADP $2.27 EPS (6.57% increase), General Dynamics $4.13 EPS (13.46% increase), Norfolk Southern $2.95 EPS (4.24% increase), MSCI $3.96 EPS (7.61% increase), Nasdaq $0.75 EPS (4.17% increase), Hess $1.51 EPS (7.36% decrease), Corning $0.56 EPS (43.59% increase), Otis $0.95 EPS (9.20% increase), and Lennox $4.23 EPS (16.53% increase). Most companies are expected to show growth in earnings per share compared to the same quarter last year.
